atk-abh03a15:1_2: catunnaṁ, bhikkhave, satipaṭṭhānānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca desessāmī”ti satipaṭṭhānasaṁyutte vuttanayeneva yesaṁ kāyādayo satiyā ārammaṇadhamme gahetvā “sabbe dhammā satipaṭṭhānā”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṁ.
atk-abh03a15:1_3: Andhakā nāma pubbaseliyā, aparaseliyā, rājagiriyā, siddhatthikāti ime pacchā uppannanikāyā.
atk-abh03a15:1_4: Tesaṁ laddhivivecanatthaṁ pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a15:1_7: Satiyā paṭṭhānā satipaṭṭhānā”ti iminā atthena satigocarāpi satipaṭṭhānā.
atk-abh03a15:1_10: Satiyova paṭṭhānā satipaṭṭhānā”ti iminā atthena satiyova satipaṭṭhānā.
atk-abh03a15:1_12: Ye pana taṁ pariyāyaṁ pahāya ekanteneva “sabbe dhammā satipaṭṭhānā”ti vadanti, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, ārammaṇavasena paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a15:1_13: Sabbe dhammā satīti anuyuttassa pana sabbesaṁ satisabhāvābhāvato paṭikkhepo tasseva.
atk-abh03a15:1_15: Ekāyanamaggo hi kilesānaṁ khayabhūtaṁ nibbānaṁ gacchatīti khayagāmī.
atk-abh03a15:1_18: Evametehi padehi “kiṁ te sabbe dhammā evarūpo te ekāyano maggo hotī”ti pucchati.
